Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ritualistic \Rit`u*al*is"tic\, a. Pertaining to, or in accordance with, a ritual; adhering to ritualism. [1913 Webster]
ritualistic adj : of or characterized by or adhering to ritualism; "a feudal or ritualistic society"; "the ritualistic killing of a sheep"
